did.unittitle: William Rice Dunbar letter to Rocky Preston Earhart
did.abstract: Letter from William Rice Dunbar, Siletz Indian Agency, Oregon, to Rocky Preston Earhart, 1 p, 31 October 1867, informing Earhart of his resignation from the Siletz Indian Agency due to a "toxic atmosphere" and requesting aid in finding new employment.

scopecontent.p: Letter from William Rice Dunbar, Siletz Indian Agency, Oregon, to Rocky Preston Earhart, 1 p, 31 October 1867, informing Earhart of his resignation from the Siletz Indian Agency due to a "toxic atmosphere" and requesting aid in finding new employment.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public.

Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. prefercite.p: William Rice Dunbar letter to Rocky Preston Earhart, Mss 1500, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
